message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_SALI_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Frequency cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_PLANNEDITEM_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: The Frequency cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_START_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The Expected Start Date entered cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_END_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The Expected End Date entered cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started".

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_START_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_FREQ
message.locale: The Expected Start Date entered cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started", because Frequency has been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_END_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_FREQ
message.locale: The Expected End Date entered cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started", because Frequency has been specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_FREQUENCY_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The Frequency in conjunction with the Expected Start Date and Expected End Date must generate at least one service authorization line item.
The Frequency in conjunction with the Expected Start Date and Expected End Date must generate at least one service authorisation line item.

message.name: INF_INITIAL_DESCRIPTION_FOR_REFERRAL_ATTACHMENT
message.locale: Attachment uploaded while creating the plan item.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_TYPE_AND_PROVIDER_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Select either Provider Type or Provider. You cannot select both Provider Type and Provider.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTUAL_END_DATE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Actual End Date, %1d, must be after the latest Service Date of the plan item, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FV_END_DATE_PRESENT_CANNOT_CANCEL_PLANNED_ITEM
message.locale: You cannot cancel the plan item as an actual end date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_NOMINEE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Nominee cannot be modified at any point of time after the plan item has a status of "Not Started".

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_XFV_UNITS_UNATTENDED_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_ATTENDANCE_IS_ENTERED_EITHER_ABSENT_OR_PARTIALLY_PRESENT
message.locale: Units Not Attended must be entered if attendance is entered as either 'Absent' or 'Partially Present'.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_ATTENDANCE_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Attendance cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_ABSENCE_REASON_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Absence Reason cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_SERVICE_DATE_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Service Date cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_TIME_PARTICIPATED_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Time Participated cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_UNITS_ATTENDED_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Units Attended cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_DAILYATTENDANCE_RV_UNITS_UNATTENDED_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORD
message.locale: Units Not Attended cannot be modified as the record was created automatically by the system.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_NO_PROVIDER_OFFERING_FOUND_FOR_DATERANGE
message.locale: There are no provider offerings configured between the expected start date %1d and expected end date %2d

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_NO_PROVIDER_OFFERING_FOUND
message.locale: The provider is not providing the selected service offering.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_SOME_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: You must specify at least one Basic Search Criteria.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_FV_UNITS_AUTHORIZED_CANNOT_BE_ZERO
message.locale: Units Authorized should be greater than zero.
Units Authorised should be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_IN_COMPLETED_STATE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: You cannot modify the plan item data as it is already completed.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_FV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_STARTDATE_IS_NOT_BEFORE
message.locale: The selected provider offering must have the Start Date before the Expected Start Date of the planned item.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_FV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_ENDDATE_IS_NOT_AFTER
message.locale: The selected provider offering must have the End Date after the Expected End Date of the planned item.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_FV_SELECT_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: Please select the service offering before searching for the providers.

message.name: INFO_PROVIDER_TYPE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_TO_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Both Provider Category and Provider Type must be selected for search criteria.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_FV_PLANNED_ITEM_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Plan Item must be selected.
